value.title: Convert data from HTML to Plain Text using Power Query for Power BI Table Visualization
value.excerpt: As we all know, Power BI table visualization does not support HTML generation. So, we need to convert our HTML text to Plain text.   With the help of Power Query function, we can easily remove HTML tags from the Text in Power Query. To implement that we need to use function HTML.table() in Power Query.
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/4UDynnPQpG4" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Create Hierarchy Slicer in Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: In this video, we will learn, how we can create a Hierarchy Slicer in Power BI Desktop. Microsoft recently introduced Hierarchy Slicer as a part of the OOTB slicers.  In this video, we will learn how to create a hierarchy slicer using OOTB slicer option. Also, we will check the different formatting properties

value.title: Exclude Blank Records from Distinct Count in Power BI
value.excerpt: Welcome to Wed with the DAX series. Today I‚Äôm going to explain one DAX function in Power BI which is ‚Äì DISTINCTCOUNTNOBLANK()   When we use the DISTICTCOUNT() function in Power BI this will calculate distinct count for the column. This will also include Blank as a distinct record. As a result due to
